author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: Legal Defense DAO
description: Legal defense requires continual funding of a coordinated effort by many professions however community efforts are only sporadically funded.
solution: Create a DAO, with sustained funding, that coordinates efforts by lawyers, accountants and lobbyists to defend against legal challenges.
experience: An experienced team of Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, SPO operators, Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts.
